}2455805{9922343 }293002930 8 {240-219922343 Cook looked blank, then

}245190{9922343 }2640{9922343 }190{9922343 }190{9922343 }235245{9922343
}2690{9922343 }245245{9922343

}{230-419922343 Cook seat down again. His bony fingers clutched one
}{230-119922343 another in a tight clasp and he said, "He's an old man.
He's been all mixed up about the Sirians for years. }{ 230-219922343
Psychopathic, almost. He sees them under his bed. He }{230-119922343
blames them for everything. If our plates are overex-}{230319922343
posed, he blames them. Since he's been back from }{230-219922343 Skius
he's worse than ever, because of what he claims }{230119922343 he went
through."}{9922343 }2690{9922343 }245240{9922343 }35953614060001450000 8
201033103310331033 {21-2-1219922343 64 }{2119922343 }{9922343
}53467{9922343 }2400{9922343 }240524{9922343 }2450{9922343
}2301424{9922343 }2401419{9922343 }2640{9922343 }2353424{9922343
}2780{9922343 }245245{9922343 }2690{9922343 }230345{9922343
}230430{9922343 }36843434060004795000 8 201033103310331033 {2219922343
